reg_info.full_title: O. Reg. 57/95: DESIGNATED AGENCIES  (DEFINITION OF “CROWN EMPLOYEE”)
reg_info.citation: O. Reg. 57/95: DESIGNATED AGENCIES  (DEFINITION OF “CROWN EMPLOYEE”)
reg_info.act_under: Public Service Act   Loi sur la fonction publique

content.content: 1. The following are designated agencies of the Crown for the purposes of the definition of “Crown employee” in section 1 of the Act: 1. Colleges of applied arts and technology established under the Ministry of Colleges and Universities Act. 2. Corporations and entities listed in the Schedule. 3. Ontario Realty Corporation. 4. Revoked: O. Reg. 333/02, s. 1 (3). O. Reg. 57/95, s. 1; O. Reg. 265/01, s. 1; O. Reg. 333/02, s. 1.
content.raw_html:
1. The following are designated agencies of the Crown for the purposes of the definition of “Crown employee” in section 1 of the Act:

1. Colleges of applied arts and technology established under the Ministry of Colleges and Universities Act.

2. Corporations and entities listed in the Schedule.

3. Ontario Realty Corporation.

4. Revoked: O. Reg. 333/02, s. 1 (3).

O. Reg. 57/95, s. 1; O. Reg. 265/01, s. 1; O. Reg. 333/02, s. 1.

content.content: 2. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation). O. Reg. 57/95, s. 2. SCHEDULE   CORPORATIONS AND ENTITIES 1. Algonquin Forestry Authority. 2. Liquor Control Board of Ontario. 3. McMichael Canadian Art Collection. 4. Metropolitan Toronto Convention Centre Corporation. 5. The Niagara Parks Commission. 6. Ontario Housing Corporation. 7. Ontario Public Service Pension Board. 8. Ottawa Congress Centre. 9. Science North. 10. Greater Toronto Transit Authority. 11. Workplace Safety and Insurance Appeals Tribunal. 12. Workplace Safety and Insurance Board. O. Reg. 333/02, s. 2. SCHEDULE 1 Revoked: O. Reg. 265/01, s. 2. SCHEDULE 2 Revoked: O. Reg. 333/02, s. 3.
content.raw_html:
2. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation). O. Reg. 57/95, s. 2.

SCHEDULE
CORPORATIONS AND ENTITIES

1. Algonquin Forestry Authority.

2. Liquor Control Board of Ontario.

3. McMichael Canadian Art Collection.

4. Metropolitan Toronto Convention Centre Corporation.

5. The Niagara Parks Commission.

6. Ontario Housing Corporation.

7. Ontario Public Service Pension Board.

8. Ottawa Congress Centre.

9. Science North.

10. Greater Toronto Transit Authority.

11. Workplace Safety and Insurance Appeals Tribunal.

12. Workplace Safety and Insurance Board.

O. Reg. 333/02, s. 2.

SCHEDULE 1 Revoked: O. Reg. 265/01, s. 2.

SCHEDULE 2 Revoked: O. Reg. 333/02, s. 3.
